verses.text: \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* mount Sion: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* moved \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever \w that|strong="H3068"\w* dwelleth

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* Jerusalem. Mountains \w are|strong="H3068"\w* round \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* round \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H0120"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* henceforth \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H0120"\w*.

For \w the|strong="H1104"\w* Lord will not leave \w the|strong="H1104"\w* rod \w of|strong="H0639"\w* sinners upon \w the|strong="H1104"\w* lot \w of|strong="H0639"\w* \w the|strong="H1104"\w* just: that \w the|strong="H1104"\w* just \w may|strong="H0639"\w* not stretch forth \w their|strong="H1104"\w* hands \w to|strong="H0639"\w* iniquity.

Do good, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* good, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w But|strong="H4325"\w* \w such|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w turn|strong="H5674"\w* aside \w into|strong="H5921"\w* bonds, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* lead \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity: peace \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Israel.
